title: Henry Winkler / Dyslexia
description: Dr. Wali tells Sean about a common Kashmiri superstition and about the importance of patience for patient’s healing. Henry Winkler shares his views on gratitude, his love of opera, and how he uses his struggles with dyslexia to help others.
author: info@hazymills.com (Hazy Mills Network)
